mapper.select: select g.goodsName,m1.price daeInPrice,m2.price yangDongPrice, m3.price muDeungPrice,m4.price malBawooPrice,m5.price moonPrice,m6.weekends weekends from goods g, marketInfo m1,marketInfo m2,marketInfo m3,marketInfo m4, marketInfo m5,marketInfo m6 where m1.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m2.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m3.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m4.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m5.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m1.marketCode=111 and m2.marketCode=222 and m3.marketCode=333 and m4.marketCode=444 and m5.marketCode=555 and m1.weekends=701 and m2.weekends=701 and m3.weekends=701 and m4.weekends=701 and m5.weekends=701

select g.goodsName,m1.price daeInPrice,m2.price yangDongPrice, m3.price muDeungPrice,m4.price malBawooPrice,m5.price moonPrice from goods g, marketInfo m1,marketInfo m2,marketInfo m3,marketInfo m4, marketInfo m5 where m1.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m2.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m3.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m4.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m5.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m1.marketCode=111 and m2.marketCode=222 and m3.marketCode=333 and m4.marketCode=444 and m5.marketCode=555 and m1.weekends=603 and m2.weekends=603 and m3.weekends=603 and m4.weekends=603 and m5.weekends=603

select g.goodsName,m1.price emartPrice,m2.price homePlusPrice,m3.price lotteMartPrice, m4.price yeongAmMartPrice,m5.price lotteMartSouthPrice from goods g, martInfo m1,martInfo m2,martInfo m3,martInfo m4,martInfo m5 where m1.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m2.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m3.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m4.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m5.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m1.martCode=11 and m2.martCode=22 and m3.martCode=33 and m4.martCode=44 and m5.martCode=55 and m1.weekends=603 and m2.weekends=603 and m3.weekends=603 and m4.weekends=603 and m5.weekends=603

select g.goodsName,m1.price daeInPrice,m2.price yangdongPrice,m3.price malbawooPrice ,round((m1.price+m2.price+m3.price)/3,0) avgMarket,m4.price emartPrice,m5.price homePlusPrice, m6.price lotteMartPrice,round((m4.price+m5.price+m6.price)/3,0) avgMart, round(((m1.price+m2.price+m3.price)/3)-((m4.price+m5.price+m6.price)/3),0) gap from goods g,marketInfo m1,marketInfo m2,marketInfo m3,martInfo m4,martInfo m5,martInfo m6 where m1.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m2.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m3.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m1.marketCode=111 and m2.marketCode=222 and m3.marketCode=444 and m4.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m5.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m6.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m4.martCode=11 and m5.martCode=22 and m6.martCode=33 and m1.weekends=701 and m2.weekends=701 and m3.weekends=701 and m4.weekends=701 and m5.weekends=701 and m6.weekends=701 order by g.goodsCode

select g.goodsName,m1.price daeInPrice,m2.price yangDongPrice, m3.price muDeungPrice,m4.price malBawooPrice,m5.price moonPrice from goods g, marketInfo m1,marketInfo m2,marketInfo m3,marketInfo m4, marketInfo m5 where g.goodsCode between 10 and 80 and m1.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m2.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m3.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m4.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m5.goodsCode=g.goodsCode and m1.marketCode=111 and m2.marketCode=222 and m3.marketCode=333 and m4.marketCode=444 and m5.marketCode=555 and m1.weekends=701 and m2.weekends=701 and m3.weekends=701 and m4.weekends=701 and m5.weekends=701
